title: Pentagon Open to AI Talks With Anthropic Before Friday Deadline
description: The Pentagon is open to more talks with Anthropic PBC to resolve a standoff over the company’s insistence on safeguards for military use of its artificial intelligence technology, a senior defense official said Friday, hours before a deadline for the firm to accept the government’s terms or face severe consequences.

title: Amazon Announces $50 Billion Investment in OpenAI
description: Amazon has announced a $50 billion investment in OpenAI, representing a major commitment to artificial intelligence technologies. This investment highlights Amazon's strategic focus on AI sector partnerships and could enhance the company's AI capabilities across its business operations.
content:
Amazon has announced a significant investment commitment of $50 billion in OpenAI, the artificial intelligence company behind ChatGPT and other AI technologies.

title: Pope Leo XIV Tells Priests Not to Write Homilies with AI
description: Pope Leo XIV warned priests in a recent engagement in Rome to not use artificial intelligence (AI) to prepare homilies, as AI "will never be able to share faith."
content:
Pope Leo XIV warned priests in a recent engagement in Rome to beware of artificial intelligence (AI) and not rely on it to prepare homilies, as AI “will never be able to share faith.

title: Block shares soar as Dorsey leans on AI to trim workforce
description: Block shares soared more than 20% in premarket trading on Friday after it announced it would nearly halve its workforce as part of an overhaul to embed artificial intelligence tools across its operations.
content:
The layoffs are the most visible signs of how the U.S. fintech industry is navigating the impact of AI, with its CEO, tech billionaire Jack Dorsey, warning that most companies were "late" to realize the emerging technology's potential.

title: Climate action an opportunity; AI can help streamline development spending: World Bank
description: New Delhi, Feb 27 (PTI) Artificial intelligence presents a major opportunity to make development spending more efficient and job-oriented, a senior World Bank official said here on Friday. Talking to PTI at the World Sustainable Summit 2026 here, Valerie Hickey, Global Director for Environment at the World Bank, said technology today is where “innovation meets […]
